snippet: The United Nations mission in Iraq said Tuesday that 979 people were killed there in September, most of them civilians caught up in the violence by Sunni insurgents.
abstract: United Nations mission in Iraq says 979 people were killed there in September, most of them civilians caught up in violence by Sunni insurgents; reports more than 5,000 have been killed since April.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations mission in Iraq said Tuesday that 979 people were killed there in September, most of them civilians caught up in the violence by Sunni insurgents.

headline.print_headline: Iraq: Nearly 1,000 Killed Last Month, And More Than 5,000 Since April
